greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} (x + x^(2*n))^n.
comment: More generally, the following sums are equal:
(2) Sum_{n>=0} binomial(n+k-1, n) * y^n * G^(n^2) / (1 - y*F*G^n)^(n+k),
for any fixed integer k; here, k = 1 and y = 1, F = x, G = x^2.
link: Paul D. Hanna, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: terms = 100; Sum[(x + x^(2*n))^n, {n, 0, terms}] + O[x]^terms // CoefficientList[#, x]& (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 16 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Oct 10 2012
